annons.annonstext:
We are looking for web developers to join our teams throughout Spotify. We need engineers in all areas of web development, from people with excellent front end skills, UI interest through to people with deep knowledge of back end integration.


What you'll do

Depending on your preferred stack and interest you will be joining one of our highly skilled, cross-functional teams as a web developer. We mainly use JavaScript, CSS, PHP and Python and web developers at Spotify have the opportunity to work on different projects and parts of the organization such as:

Building world-class platforms and tools for our global Content Partners that allow for the curation and life-cycle control of all content in Spotify’s vast and fast growing library.
Creating the user interface (UI) and design language across the full range of different platforms supported by the Spotify client application.
Developing customer service systems ensuring our customers are given the best experience and support.
Configuring integrations with payment providers around the world while ensuring the right user experience and product is delivered to our users. 
Working with the Web API team on Spotify’s Developer site and tooling related to the Web API.
Being part of one of our feature teams creating and improving our user-facing feature where additional skills in any of the following: backend/java, android or iOS platforms is a plus.
As well as working within a dedicated team, you will also be part of the Spotify Web Guild. Here you will share knowledge and mix with some of the best developers in the business and contribute to the company’s engineering culture. We regularly have hack weeks where you can spend your time working on your own projects to the benefit of the company.

You will be working from our awesome offices in central Stockholm. We offer relocation packages if you do not currently live in Sweden’s capital.

Who you are

You have a passion for web development.
You love to take on difficult challenges.
You are adaptable and resourceful and you are able to develop effective solutions to problems.
You understand when it's better to go for the quick win and when it's better to drive through a comprehensive technical solution.
You are committed to providing our users with the very best music experience in the world.
You understand that development means teamwork and enjoy working with cross functional teams.
You are curious and interested in constant learning.

About us

At Spotify we like to challenge one another and constantly sharpen and improve our ways of working. We are strong believers in Agile methods and we are flexible enough to adapt the methods so that they suit what’s needed. We strongly believe that diversity of experience, of perspective, and of background leads to a better workplace for our employees and to a better product.

We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. We strongly believe that diversity of experience, perspectives, and background will lead to a better environment for our employees and a better product for our users and our creators. This is something we value deeply and we encourage everyone to come be a part of changing the way the world listens to music.

ansokan.ovrigt_om_ansokan: All CVs must be in English.
